name: Lilypond-songs
tagline: Lilypond files for "Songs from the Public Domain"
body:
You can buy the book through Amazon [here](http://www.amazon.com/Songs-Public-Domain-Containing-Protection/dp/1484022807/).

You can download the PDF [with](http://bbloomf.github.io/lilypond-songs/PDFs/sftpd.pdf) or [without](http://bbloomf.github.io/lilypond-songs/PDFs/sftpd-playbook.pdf) margins, and the MIDIs are all below.

### MIDIs

* [America](downloads/America.midi)
